Articles.Content:
My question is how difficult to change the ingame data transfer model via the antennas.

 

 

I have looked for ScanSat and RemoteTech and noticed a very interesting thing.

 

 

The antennas actually do not transfer any data. They send "science points" only.


Some non-stock antennas even do not have a Mits limit.

 

 

Looks strange when a single temperature value takes seconds to transfer and drains battery significiantly, but any high-res photo is sent completely for free.

 

 

I know it's a rather complex task. But many sources this fall discuss the "antenna coverage feature" in KSP 1.1.

So changing the ingame data transfer model sound pretty logical.

 

 

It would be great to have data speed limiters in KSP. Especially when exploring the deep space with unmanned stuff.

Edited December 29, 2015 by _Astra_
